name: Narika
description: Culturally specific support services in South Asian languages
fullDescription: Narika provides culturally specific support services for South Asian individuals and families, offering a confidential helpline, case management, legal advocacy, and support groups in multiple South Asian languages.
whatTheyOffer:
- Confidential helpline
- Case management
- Legal advocacy
- Support groups
- Immigration assistance
- Housing support
- Services in Hindi, Urdu, Punjabi, Bengali, Tamil, and more
- Culturally sensitive approach
howToGetIt:
1. Call helpline: 800-215-7308
2. Or email: narika@narika.org
3. Speak with trained advocate
4. Services in your language
5. Receive culturally sensitive support
6. Access resources and referrals
keywords: Narika, South Asian, Hindi, Urdu, Punjabi, Bengali, Tamil, helpline, case management, legal advocacy, immigration assistance, housing support, 800-215-7308
